page.title: 15CHANGING TIMES IN SANDBACH
page.content: WE INTERVIEWED SEVERAL PEOPLE FROM OUR BLOCK WHO HAVE LIVED HERE MOST OF THEIR LIVES AND ASKED THEM FOR THEIR{ {ATTITUDES}TO THE CHANGES THAT HAVE TAKEN PLACE. PEOPLE SEEM TO MISS THE OLD CINEMA AND NOTICED HOW MUCH THE { {TRAFFIC}HAS INCREASED IN NOISE AND SIZE. THERE USED TO BE MANY MORE DANCING FACILITIES AND PEOPLE WERE MUCH FRIENDLIER. THE SCHOOLS ARE MUCH LESS STRICT AND THERE USED TO BE A DECENT CAFE IN THE CENTRE. ONE PERSON REMEMBERED THE OLD SUNDAY SCHOOL TRIPS. SHE ALSO GAVE US A BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF THE{SECOND WORLD WAR} AND HOW SHE USED TO MAKE AMMUNITION AND SHE REMEMBERED THE FOOD RATIONING. THE NEAREST{CINEMA}IS LOCATED IN HANLEY. THERE USED TO BE ONE IN CREWE BUT LIKE MOST CINEMAS IT HAS CLOSED DOWN.
